thread.title: Joanne Dunne
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Joanne Dunne

author: Joanne Dunne
title: Joanne Dunne
text: The process to secure a space and finalize everything was first-rate. I rented a space at Public Storage on Roosevelt Blvd. in Arlington, VA and I would highly recommend it. Rob, my service manager, could not have been better!! Rob walked me through everything, checked back as I was finishing moving in and made sure I was pleased. He provided grade A customer service!!!
